item.title: 申银万国考虑迁回中国，为香港上市铺平道路
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，申银万国集团有限公司（Shein Group Ltd.）已考虑将其基地迁回中国，希望这有助于说服北京当局同意这家快速时尚零售商在香港上市的计划。【原文：Shein Group Ltd. has considered moving its base back to China in the hopes that it would help sway Beijing authorities to sign off on the fast-fashion retailer’s plans to go public in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普关税被视为促进中国-全球南方贸易新秩序
item.description: 根据 S&P Global 的研究，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税战正在加速中国政府向被称为 "全球南方 "的发展中国家推进贸易和投资，有可能创造一个由中国企业主导的新贸易秩序。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff war is accelerating Beijing’s trade and investment push into developing nations known as the Global South, according to research by S&P Global, potentially creating a new trade order dominated by Chinese firms.】

item.title: S&P确认美国的信用评级基于关税收入和复原力
item.description: 美国全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）确认了美国在全球最大经济体中的评级，尽管最近的支出法案对美国财政造成了冲击，但美国仍能保持其信用优势，部分原因是关税收入将减轻美国的痛苦。【原文：The US can maintain its credit strength despite the fiscal hit of a recent spending bill, in part because tariff revenues will reduce the pain, according to S&P Global Ratings, which has affirmed its rating for the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为中国银行股因股息和利润率而上涨
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Chinese bank stocks are poised to rise in the second half, attracting dividend-seeking investors as the sector benefits from stabilizing net interest margins and growing fee income, according to a JPMorgan Chase & Co. analyst.】

item.title: 中国液化天然气需求低迷 广东改革面临更多障碍
item.description: 南方广东省进行的市场改革可能会减少发电厂对液化天然气的需求，中国不温不火的液化天然气进口面临进一步压力。【原文：China’s tepid imports of liquefied natural gas face further pressure after market reforms in the southern province of Guangdong that could cut demand for the fuel from power plants.】

item.title: VPBank 计划证券部门今年晚些时候在越南上市
item.description: 越南繁荣股份公司银行（Vietnam Prosperity JSC Bank）由三井住友金融集团（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group）支持，据知情人士透露，该银行计划在今年晚些时候对其证券部门进行首次公开募股。【原文：Vietnam Prosperity JSC Bank, known as VPBank and backed by Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group, plans an initial public offering of its securities unit later this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长李明博在政策会议前强调贸易和经济增长风险
item.description: 韩国银行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang Yong）在下周的政策决策前表示，韩国经济在第二季度出现反弹，但仍面临美国与主要经济体贸易谈判带来的高度不确定性。【原文：South Korea’s economy rebounded in the second quarter but still faces high levels of uncertainty from US trade talks with major economies, Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang Yong said ahead of next week’s policy decision.】

item.title: 流行超市盈利可能推动股价反弹，但股价仍低于目标价
item.description: Pop Mart 的上半年收益和前景评论可能会为投资者在长达数月的盘整后建立股票仓位提供新的理由。【原文：Pop Mart’s first-half earnings and outlook commentary may provide a fresh reason for investors to build positions in the shares after a months-long consolidation.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔会议前交易员追踪美国外交政策，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 交易员们权衡了美国主导的结束乌克兰战争的努力，并对美联储杰克逊霍尔年度会议进行了倒计时，这次会议可能会对可能的降息作出暗示，因此黄金变化不大。【原文：Gold was little changed as traders weighed US-led efforts to end the war in Ukraine, and counted down to the Federal Reserve’s annual Jackson Hole gathering, which may yield hints on possible rate cuts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行第三次降息后消费者信心大增
item.description: 在储备银行今年第三次降息并表示有可能进一步放宽政策后，澳大利亚 8 月份的消费者信心大增。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence surged in August after the Reserve Bank cut interest rates for the third time this year and signaled further easing is likely.】

item.title: 黄金反弹激发兴趣，在伊斯兰投资中获得牵引力
item.description: 在距离马来西亚首都一小时车程的一个小镇上，一个全新的、高度安全的保险库表明，为迎合伊斯兰教原则而设计的黄金产品和服务越来越受欢迎。【原文：In a small town an hour’s drive from Malaysia’s capital, a new, high-security vault illustrates the growing popularity of gold products and services designed to cater to Islamic principles.】

item.title: 新西兰人口增长速度为三年来最慢
item.description: 新西兰的人口增长速度是近三年来最慢的，因为经济复苏乏力，外国移民望而却步，促使更多的公民离开新西兰。【原文：New Zealand’s population is growing at the slowest pace in almost three years as a sluggish economic recovery deters foreign immigrants and prompts more citizens to depart.】

item.title: 巴西反击美国对其贸易行为的调查
item.description: 巴西坚决驳斥华盛顿关于不公平贸易做法的指控，称美国贸易代表就此展开的调查是对美国单边贸易法的非法利用。【原文：Brazil is forcefully rejecting Washington’s allegations of unfair trade practices, describing an investigation launched by the US Trade Representative into the matter as an illegitimate use of unilateral US trade law.】

item.title: 软银同意向英特尔投资 20 亿美元，作为在美投资的一部分
item.description: 软银集团同意投资 20 亿美元购买英特尔公司的股票，这是两家公司为 "深化对美国先进技术和芯片创新的承诺 "所做努力的一部分。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. agreed to invest $2 billion in Intel Corp. stock, part of a push by the companies to “deepen their commitment” to advanced US technology and chip innovation.】

item.title: 帕利哈皮蒂亚国王退休近三年后重返 SPAC
item.description: Chamath Palihapitiya 在 2022 年放弃了两家未能找到目标的巨型公司后，正在重返空白支票游戏。【原文：Chamath Palihapitiya is returning to the blank-check game after throwing in the towel in 2022 on a pair of jumbo firms that failed to find targets.】

item.title: Starling 银行收购会计初创公司，为中小企业提供税务工具
item.description: Starling 银行收购了英国会计软件初创公司 Ember，为其小型企业客户提供税务和记账工具。【原文：Starling Bank has acquired British accounting-software startup Ember to offer tax and book-keeping tools to its small business customers.】

item.title: 中国股市反弹具备持久牛市的条件
item.description: 中国股市没有出现散户的亢奋情绪，这可能会限制由人群推动的繁荣和萧条的风险，从而使近期的反弹更具持久力。【原文：The absence of a retail euphoria in China’s stock market is likely to limit the risk of crowd-driven booms and busts, potentially giving the recent rally more staying power.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔会议前亚洲股市低迷：市场综述
item.description: 在投资者等待美联储重要会议以及美国总统唐纳德-特朗普寻求结束乌克兰战争的谈判之际，亚洲股市开盘表现平淡。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a muted open as investors await a key Federal Reserve gathering and as President Donald Trump pursues talks to end the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国顶级经济学家称人民币可能升值至每美元 7 元以上
item.description: 据一位中国顶级经济学家称，人民币兑美元汇率可能会进一步上涨，突破7，因为市场参与者对中国政府是否允许人民币升值的争论越来越多。【原文：The yuan may see further gains past 7 against the dollar, according to a top Chinese economist, as debate grows among market participants over whether Beijing will allow it to appreciate.】

item.title: 主要出口产品承压，必和必拓全年利润暴跌 26
item.description: 由于中国需求疲软，铁矿石和焦煤等主要出口产品仍然面临压力，必和必拓集团全年利润下降了 26%。【原文：BHP Group’s full-year profit fell 26% as key exports such as iron ore and coking coal remained under pressure amid soft demand from China.】

item.title: 焦点转向乌克兰战争问题三方会谈，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 随着白宫推动召开包括俄罗斯总统普京在内的三方峰会以结束冲突，交易商对乌克兰停火前景进行了权衡，石油价格趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as traders weighed the outlook for a ceasefire in Ukraine, with the White House pushing for a trilateral summit that includes Russian President Vladimir Putin to end the conflict.】

item.title: 基于区块链的贷款机构 Figure Technology 公开申请 IPO
item.description: 基于区块链的信贷公司Figure Technology Solutions Inc.公开申请首次公开募股，加入了加密货币相关公司进入市场的大潮。【原文：Blockchain-based credit company Figure Technology Solutions Inc. filed publicly for an initial public offering, joining the rush of crypto-related firms entering the market.】

item.title: 财政前景黯淡，日本准备拍卖 20 年期债券
item.description: 日本周二的 20 年期国债拍卖将受到密切关注，因为政府支出激增的风险会影响投资者对超长期限债券的偏好。【原文：Japan’s auction of 20-year government bonds on Tuesday will be closely watched as the risk of a government spending surge weighs on investor appetite for super-long debt.】

item.title: CSL 将分拆疫苗部门 Seqirus，裁员 15
item.description: 澳大利亚生物技术巨头 CSL 有限公司表示，作为重组的一部分，该公司将把 Seqirus 疫苗业务分拆成一家独立的上市公司，届时该公司每年将裁员 15%，削减成本约 5 亿美元。【原文：Australian biotech giant CSL Ltd. said it will spin off its Seqirus vaccine business into a separately listed company as part of a restructure that will see it reduce its workforce by as much as 15% and cut costs by around $500 million a year.】

item.title: 网络安全事件导致伊诺特业务运营中断
item.description: Inotiv 公司称，本月早些时候发生的一起网络安全事件中断了公司的某些业务运营。【原文：Inotiv Inc. said a cybersecurity incident earlier this month has disrupted certain business operations at the company.】

item.title: 乌克兰电信美股在首次亮相后因和谈而大涨
item.description: 在华盛顿举行的一次会议为结束俄罗斯和乌克兰之间的战争带来了希望之际，投资者抢购了乌克兰最大移动运营商的新美股，该运营商的董事会成员中有前国务卿迈克-蓬佩奥（Mike Pompeo）。【原文：As a gathering in Washington raised hopes for an end to the war between Russia and Ukraine, investors snapped up the new US shares of the largest Ukrainian mobile operator that has former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo on its board.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会称两名布鲁克林男子在内幕交易中获利 220 万美元
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会对来自纽约布鲁克林的两名男子提出了新的指控，他们被控在处理公司监管文件的工作中窃取机密信息，目前称这两人从非法交易中获利 220 多万美元。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission laid out new allegations against two men from Brooklyn, New York, who are accused of stealing confidential information from jobs processing corporate regulatory filings, now saying the pair pocketed more than $2.2 million from illicit trades.】

item.title: 帕洛阿尔托因 2026 年预测强于预期而跃升
item.description: Palo Alto Networks 公司的年度业绩预测强于预期，公司业绩大涨，因为该公司正努力为客户提供一系列人工智能网络安全产品，以抵御攻击。【原文：Palo Alto Networks Inc. jumped on a stronger-than-expected annual forecast, as the company seeks to provide customers with a bundle of AI-enabled cybersecurity products to fend off attacks.】

item.title: 亚马逊扩建位于曼哈顿中城的 WeWork 办公空间
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）与 WeWork 公司签订了一份新租约，这将使该零售商能够扩大其在曼哈顿中城的业务。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. signed a new lease with WeWork Inc. that will allow the retailer to expand its presence in midtown Manhattan.】

item.title: 摩根大通必须面对儿子掠夺年迈母亲的指控
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）试图阻止一位 85 岁的遗孀在仲裁中提出索赔，称该公司未能阻止她的儿子从她的银行账户中抽走 800 多万美元，但最终以失败告终。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. lost an attempt to stop an 85-year-old widow from pursuing claims in arbitration that the company failed to prevent her son from siphoning more than $8 million from her bank accounts.】
